title: The Redman and the child
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: A noble Sioux avenges the murder of an old white man who had been his friend. Based on the novel by Bret Harte. Cast includes Charles Inslee, John Tansey, Linda Arvidson, George Gebhardt, Harry Solter. Silent film with no intertitles.
